channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Compress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Compress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47384|2024-10-05T14:53:25.673Z -- wp%20compress -- wp%20compress%20%E2%80%93%20image%20optimizer%20%5Ball-in-one%5D
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Compress WP Compress – Image Optimizer [All-In-One] allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Compress – Image Optimizer [All-In-One]: from n/a through 6.20.13.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WP Compress WP Compress – Image Optimizer [All-In-One].This issue affects WP Compress – Image Optimizer [All-In-One]: from n/a through 6.10.35.
